text:
Hello,
I am using an API to create emails in HubSpot. The post request is working and the email is being created with the given properties. However, the HTML filled is not rendering in HubSpot / or i am not able to find it. any idea in which module/destination the html landing ?

```Post request :

Request URL:
POST <https://api.hubapi.com/marketing-emails/v1/emails?hapikey={{hapikey}}>

{
		"name": "My first API marketing email!",
		"subject": "Sample subject line",
		"fromName": "Sample Author",
		"campaign": "eeeeeeee-eeee-eeee-eeee",
		"CampaignName": "Sample - My first inbound campaign in HubSpot",
		"emailBody": "<tr><td>TestTestTestTest</td></tr>"
	}```

```Hi,

I am getting some random behaviours regarding ticket reply history. I am using engagement API to fetch associated email reply list. I am using "UTC-5:00 Eastern" Time zone.

"646984486", this is my ticket object id
Using engagement api to fetch data associated list "<https://api.hubapi.com/crm-associations/v1/associations/646984486/HubSpot_DEFINED/17?hapikey=**&limit=100>" from this list

After fetch associated list, catch latest "offset" key value to get all the reply histroy "<https://api.hubapi.com/engagements/v1/engagements/16993031082?hapikey=**>"

Most of the cases is working fine, But not in all case. Could you please guide me what is missing from my side```

```I am getting some random behaviours regarding ticket reply history. I am using engagement API to fetch associated email reply list. I am using "UTC-5:00 Eastern" Time zone.

"646984486", this is my ticket object id
Using engagement api to fetch data associated list "<https://api.hubapi.com/crm-associations/v1/associations/646984486/HubSpot_DEFINED/17?hapikey=**&limit=100>" from this list

After fetch associated list, catch latest "offset" key value to get all the reply histroy "<https://api.hubapi.com/engagements/v1/engagements/16993031082?hapikey=**>"

Most of the cases is working fine, But not in all case. Could you please guide me what is missing from my side```
